titles.title: S-Corp Access to Crowdfunding Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make an exception to the 100 shareholder S corporation limitation in the case of shareholders whose shares were acquired through certain crowd-funding or small public offerings.
S-Corp Access to Crowdfunding Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
S-Corp Access to Crowdfunding Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the taxation of S corporations, to exclude from the 100 shareholder limitation for such corporations individuals who acquired shares in an S corporation through: (1) small public offerings, or (2) one or more crowdfunding offerings.
